thread.section_title: Comedy News on The Huffington Post
thread.title: Samantha Bee Thanks CNN For 'Feeding' Kellyanne Conway To Jake Tapper
thread.title_full: Samantha Bee Thanks CNN For 'Feeding' Kellyanne Conway To Jake Tapper

author: Lee Moran
title: Samantha Bee Thanks CNN For 'Feeding' Kellyanne Conway To Jake Tapper
text:
Samantha Bee Thanks CNN For 'Feeding' Kellyanne Conway To Jake Tapper "Damn, Jake. Wow, I didn’t think CNN let you use the F-word on the air." 02/09/2017 03:13 am ET Lee Moran Trends Editor, The Huffington Post Samantha Bee was glued to CNN on Tuesday. From Jake Tapper’s fiery exchange with President Donald Trump’s adviser, Kellyanne Conway, to a sensible debate over healthcare between Sens. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.) and Ted Cruz (R-Texas) , Bee was stunned that the network had become utterly watchable. “I know! We couldn’t believe it, either,” Bee said on Wednesday’s broadcast of “ Full Frontal .” After hailing CNN for “feeding” the “flaxen-haired fountain of lies” Conway into Tapper’s cage, Bee praised the news host for his comprehensive takedown of Trump’s aide, during which he repeatedly used the term “falsehood.” “Damn, Jake. Wow, I didn’t think CNN let you use the f-word on the air,” quipped Bee. 
Check out the full segment above. Related Coverage
